metadata.title: CVE-2018-6096 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A JavaScript focused window could overlap the fullscreen notification inFullscreen in Google Chrome prior to 66.0.3359.117 allowed a remoteattacker to obscure the full screen warning via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
